Choices:
A. \frac { 1 } { 25 }
B. \frac { 1 } { 5 }
C. 5
D. 25
Answer with the letter.
conversations_v0.answer: Answer: C (The scale factor between two similar figures is the square root of the ratio of their areas. Given that the area of trapezoid J K L M is 138 square feet, and the area of trapezoid Q R S T is 5.52 square feet, the scale factor can be calculated by finding the square root of the ratio 138 / 5.52, which results in approximately 5)
